content: in next 3 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet* around 15 11 single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet increase in next 3 single_crochet single_crochet in last 6 single_crochet 18 12 work even 18 14 15 increase in first 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet in next 12 single_crochet increase in last 3 single_crochet 24 around this row if you are using safety eyes you ll want to put them on now i put mine between row 10 & 11 on the side opposite of my seam 16 single_crochet in first 9 single_crochet *decrease over next 2 single_crochet* 3 times single_crochet in last 9 single_crochet 21 **stuff the nose at this point as it s hard to get to at the end** 17 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet same as joining single_crochet in next 18 single_crochet increase in last 2 single_crochet 24 18 single_crochet in first 11 single_crochet increase in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet last 11 single_crochet 26 19 single_crochet in first 10 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet in last 10 single_crochet 28 20 single_crochet in first 13 single_crochet increase in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in last 13 single_crochet 30 21 work even 30 23 begin stuffing body as you go along make sure you get the head stuffed well 24 *single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet* around 36 25 work even 36 30 31 *single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 1 decrease* around 30 32 work even 30 34 35 *single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 1 decrease* around 24 36 work even 24 37 *single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 1 decrease* around 18 38 *decrease over 2* single_crochet around 9 **stuff rest of body at this point bind off leaving an 8 tail thread the tail through the remaining stitches and pull it tight to close up the hole and knot the end tuck the tail under several stitches and cut off the tail page 3 of 10 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com ears make 2 row instructions stitches 1 *using body color* 5 chain 2 5 single_crochet in second chain from hook 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around increasing in the last stitch 6 3 *single_crochet in 1 single_crochet increase in next* around 9 4 increase in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet 3 single_crochet 11 5 decrease 4 times when you get to the last 3 stitches decrease them 5 all at once bind off leaving a long tail the ears will not be stuffed they will be flat but will stand up on armando s head legs make 4 row instructions stitches 1 start using the darker color 6 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook change to body color before starting round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around including the slip_stitch from the previous round 7 3 5 work even 7 bind off leaving a tail long enough to sew each leg to
